text: Andrzej Owczarek (21 June 1950 - 6 November 2020) was a Polish politician, activist and educator. He was a member of the Civic Platform. Owczarek was born in Pabianice, Poland. From 1990 to 1996, he was the Mayor of Łask. From 2005 to 2015, he was a member of the Polish Senate. Owczarek died of COVID-19 in Łódź, Poland, on 6 November 2020, at the age of 70.Zmarł Andrzej Owczarek. title: Andrzej Owczarek
